name: Mall Madness - Designer Shoe Blowout
description:
Mall Madness - Designer Shoe Blowout is an amazing fun, extremely addictive and keeps you coming back again and again. This is the funnest tap game and it is at your finger tips.

Collect these cute designer shoes. There are 3 games to choose from. Easy if you want to play it safe, Advanced when you are looking for a great challenge or play the Timer version against the clock.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Mall Madness - Designer Shoe Blowout.
